text: Alpha Oumar Konaré (born 2 February 1946) is a former President of Mali for two five-year terms (1992 to 2002), and was Chairperson of the African Union Commission from 2003 to 2008. In September 2021, Konaré was urgently hospitalized in Morocco at Cheikh Zaid Hospital in Rabat. == Other websites == ==References== Category:1946 births Category:Presidents of Mali Category:Living people Category:Chairpersons of the African Union Commission
title: Alpha Oumar Konaré
